Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory29.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'As you can see, this is my chamber.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You've got what you want. How about me?", 3: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'You want to see Liv, right? Here... I will show you the image.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Liv is in the northeastern part of the desert, a temporary base of your Joint Task Force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'As you can tell, my servants are lying deep underneath the sand, observing everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'The Joint Task Force, the Gray Ravens, the Goldfinches, the Purifying Force... I can see your every move.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'The moment you entered my domain, you have been under my watchful eyes.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'You are not yet worthy to speak in front of me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Watch yourself extra carefully within my chamber.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'My servants are capable of way more than just observing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is it that you want?', 3: '21'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'I... have ever only wanted one thing...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Infinite golden dust shimmers in the air behind Nat.'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'To save Earth.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory35.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "(Opens the retriever) It's shorted out again... Is the sand too small for it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll have to block the vent of the analysis kiln. It'll overheat... but it's the only way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I can't let the sand fall inside the vent. I'll have to switch to another sample if the retriever's shorted out again.", 4: '1'}
